detailsData.title: Unique Experience
detailsData.content: As former prosecutors, our lawyers have an intimate understanding of the perspective from the other side. We know what to anticipate in court because we have been there and understand what tactics they may employ.

detailsData.title: Client Communication
detailsData.content: We pride ourselves in being available to our clients and providing ongoing support throughout the entire legal process. We will respond promptly to your questions and concerns to encourage a strong, effective attorney-client relationship.

detailsData.title: Reputation
detailsData.content: Our efforts and experience have earned us a reputation as reliable and effective lawyers within our community. As trial lawyers, we can routinely be seen in court, and our firm’s lawyers are well-respected by the Mecklenburg County District Attorney's Office and Charlotte's Judges.

detailsData.title: Personalized Representation
detailsData.content: At Browning & Long, PLLC you are not just a case file or number. Every client matters! That is why Todd and Howard always strive to achieve results that exceed your expectations.
